member.name: T:Varnex.AuthService.Abstractions.DTOs.AuthResponseDto
member.summary: Data transfer object for authentication response containing token and user information.

member.summary: Gets or sets the JWT authentication token.

member.summary: Gets or sets the token expiration time in seconds.

member.summary: Gets or sets the authenticated user's unique identifier.

member.name: P:Varnex.AuthService.Abstractions.DTOs.AuthResponseDto.Email
member.summary: Gets or sets the authenticated user's email address.

member.name: P:Varnex.AuthService.Abstractions.DTOs.LoginDto.Password
member.summary: Gets the user's password.

member.name: P:Varnex.AuthService.Abstractions.DTOs.RegisterDto.Address
